DOC.brief_title: Curarisation Intubation Conditions During Videolaryngoscopy With Glidescope Titanium
DOC.detailed_description: In prospective , randomize study , investigator assess intubation condition videolaryngoscopy Glidescope Titanium whether patient receive ( curare ( Atracurium ) group ) ( control group ) within elective surgery patient difficult intubation prediction . The IDS score assess anesthesiologist video-recording primary outcome . All general anesthesia standardize use Target Control Infusion propofol sufentanil . The investigator also compare IDS score assess intubators , time tracheal intubation , laryngeal morbidity group .
DOC.criteria: Elective Surgery Adult Patients difficult intubation prediction
